D2 Exploitation Pack

License information

WARRANTIES.

Readme
-------

This tool dumps the credentials of Windows Task Scheduler.
Tested on : Win XP SP2 FR/US and Win2003 SP1-SP2 FR/US.

usage: c:\> d2sec_taskpwddump.exe
